extendedInfo.description: WATCH GAMEPLAY HERE: http://youtu.be/WHi9cT8CvhAWARNING: People with little creativity and/or no desire to think could damage themselves attempting to use this application! You see, it's not really a game, but a creative experience...and it may not be for you! DO YOU: -Like to take things apart and figure out how they work? -Make computers think? -Watch MacGyver and say to yourself...'Ya, I could do that.'? THEN GET THIS APP!!! BUT IF YOU: -Want to just pop bubbles -Fling some birds -Make some bunnies dance -WONT READ THE VERY BRIEF INSTRUCTIONS... YOU MIGHT WANT TO SKIP THIS ONE. ---------------------------------- (still not sure? watch the video tute here http://www.thecowapp.com ) ================================ "IS IT A COW!?" is a 20-question style game that you kind of play... but more importantly it's something YOU BUILD! YOU will be teaching the program about animals and their traits...seeing JUST HOW SMART you can make it! Pick basic animals and choose common traits and TEACH TEACH TEACH and you just might end up with a world-class ZooIQ!

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Awesome and very smart. Makes you do some thinking about how you can describe different animals
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple fun!
reviews.comment: Gotta think on this one!  Im up to 50 animals and its still smart!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wack!!!  Nothing happens waste of space
